text: Bertalan Dunay (29 October 1877 - 1 March 1961) was a Hungarian fencer. He competed in the individual sabre and foil events at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1877 births Category:1961 deaths Category:Hungarian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Hungary Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:People from Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén County
title: Bertalan Dunay
